abstract.text: The
module provides a high-performance, type-safe framework
for defining and manipulating finite state machines in Swift.
It is designed for both academic and production use, supporting extensibility
and cross-platform compatibility.

inlineContent.text: Finite state machines (FSMs) are mathematical models of computation widely used in software engineering, linguistics, and hardware design. This library aims to make FSMs accessible and idiomatic for Swift developers.
Supports FSMs in various programming languages
For detailed usage, see the tutorials and API documentation.
